name: Pew Pew Pill
description:
Push the blocks around so that you can climb high enough to collect the stars - be aware of those pesky red pills -  use Pew Pew Pill to shoot and *pop* your enemies! You have 5 minutes to gain as many points as possible to set the new high score!

Points are gained by collecting stars, *popping* enemies and a bonus is given if you have ammo left to spare.

Controls: Movement (WASD), Jump (Space), Aim & Fire (Mouse & L/R buttons).
